title: For Patients
intro: Information for patients participating in or interested in our research.
content:
What is Health-AI?

Health-AI is a research project that uses artificial intelligence to help doctors make better treatment decisions. Our goal is to improve patient outcomes while minimizing side effects.

How does this affect me?

If you are participating in one of our clinical trials, the AI tools developed by Health-AI may help your doctors better understand your individual situation and tailor your treatment accordingly.

faqs.question: Is my data safe?
faqs.answer: Yes, we follow strict EU data protection regulations (GDPR) and all data is anonymized and securely stored.

faqs.question: How can I participate?
faqs.answer: Please contact your healthcare provider or reach out to us through our contact page for information about ongoing studies.
